title: David Lynch wannabe?
review: Yorgos Lanthimos gives David Lynch a run for his money with this film.

title: This movie sucks
review: It's an attempt of thirty somethings reinventing a past to suit their progressive leanings. They are idiots. I will make a point never to see any producer, director, and actors involved in this movie ever again. This movie is nothing but a complete reprehensible perversion of history.
